summary: This music documentary is produced and directed by the same filmmaker who brought Monterrey Pop to the screen. It features performances from a 1969 Toronto rock 'n roll festival. The film ... See full summary »

title: John Lennon and the Plastic Ono Band: Sweet Toronto
